title: Florida’s Brightline Skips Second Payment on Subordinate Munis
description: Brightline Trains Florida, the Fortress Investment Group-backed passenger railroad, skipped its second interest payment on $1.2 billion of subordinate municipal bonds.
content: Brightline Trains Florida, the Fortress Investment Group-backed passenger railroad, skipped its second interest payment on $1.2 billion of subordinate municipal bonds.
